testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: On the Password page, when valid values are entered in the Current Password, New Password,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user verifies that they are on the mainLogin page..................passed And The user clicks on the Admin Login button...............................passed And The user switchs to an other new Admin Login page.......................passed And The user enters their mail address and password to the mailtextbox and passwordtextbox.passed And The user clicks on the Sign In button...................................passed And The user clicks on the profile icon on the admin panels top bar.........passed And The user clicks on the password link....................................passed And The user enters valid values in the Current Password "adminPassword", New Password "newPassword", and Confirm Password "newPasswordConfirm" text boxes.passed And The user clicks on the Change Password button...........................passed Then The user verifies that, the password is changed........................passed
